name: Lost (itch) (grouter)
description:
Prototype of my idea designed for mobile device. Prototype only for PC.

Main objective is to collect the small yellow balls to increase your score and another small balls which will buff you (more info in game HELP menu).
Avoid the red balls.

Movement: you can move only diagonally and with every click/button you will change your direction.  The directions are in this order: SE, SW, NW, NE, SE, SW...

Controlls: mouse click / any button
